heading: Tourism trips by train in the EU
subheading: Share of tourist trips made by train in the EU in 2022. On average, 0.12% of all tourist trips in the 27 EU Member States were made by train.
textNote: This collection covers national tourism, in other words tourism by residents of a country to destinations in the country of residence (domestic tourism) or abroad (outbound tourism). No data available for Cyprus and Denmark.
